website_summaries.verdict: Part of the skate sneakers collection from the DC brand is the DC Maswell sneakers. Like most DC sneakers, it garnered positive reviews not just for its style and colors but also for comfort and performance.Its heavily reinforced upper provides sufficient foot support and protection and at the same time gives a distinct look that many perceived as trendy.Although narrow-fitting for most, it still left a general impression of being comfortable when worn especially with the right shoe size on. Lastly, it is affordable and offers loads of color options.
pros: The DC Maswell shoe looks "wicked great," according to a couple of reviewers
Many users were pleased that the Maswell shoe from DC is exactly what they wanted in terms of comfort and style combined
Some wearers reported that they receive multiple compliments wearing this shoe because of its nice colors
Buyers have loads of colorway options for the DC Maswell skate shoe
Like most DC sneakers, this particular model bears a budget-friendly price tag
This shoe offers moderate arch support according to several buyers
One video reviewer emphasized that because of its multi-panel upper with lots of reinforcements on high wear areas, durability wouldn’t be a primary issue of the Maswell shoe
cons: More than half of the reviewers commented that the DC Maswell skate shoes fit smaller and narrow than usual

customer_reviews.title: Wasted $35 dollars
customer_reviews.text: I use to be 10.5 for the longest time then I went up to 11 and I've been every since. This shoe says size 11 mens but they feel like a 10 to me.. I've tried everything from wearing them, running in them and working in them, it's been 2 weeks and these things crush my toes. What a waste of money. I'll stick to buying shoes in person rather than online.
customer_reviews.author: Justin KJV

customer_reviews.title: 10 year old loves these shoes. Lasting very well!
customer_reviews.text: Our son runs shoes out so fast, it's amazing these are holding up so well. I highly recommend them to kids to tend to run "high miles" on all their shoes. We'll definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: MO folk

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my brother we both love dc shoes he says they are a but tight but you guys don't have wide as an option for shoes so maybey that can be fixed someday.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Poor materials
customer_reviews.text: These fell apart after less than a week of wearing. The "leather" tore open at the toes (without hitting or snagging or help). Usually, a big fan of the brand, BUT these were a huge let down. Save your money....
customer_reviews.author: GoddessOfGoodVibes

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit good. Quality materials so they should hold up to some abuse. Only thing I don't like is the tongue has a tendency to slide since there is no loop to put your shoe strings through.
customer_reviews.author: James Avon

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is of a very solid quality put together very well with a fantastic finish. Unfortunately, I had to return them mostly because I have lower than usual ankles and the side top rubbed on my ankle bone.
customer_reviews.author: Benny Teague

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: A bit tight in the toe section but lessens up over time enough to be comfortable enough. Strong build and quality materials. Have walked over 90 miles so far in them look as new as the day I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kanvis

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Fit well, and are sturdy. My son likes the extra lacing holes, helps secure the shoe around the ankle. Color is very nice too.
customer_reviews.author: HmSkillit

customer_reviews.title: DC shoes
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly stiff in the toe area but will get more comfortable as I wear them over time nice design real leather so overall I'm happy I have the white and blue also they will take time to break in but worth the money
customer_reviews.author: James Cates

customer_reviews.title: Women get all the selection of shoes and clothes
customer_reviews.text: I'm really only upset with product availability. Didn't have the color or width. I bought a size 12 because there was no green 11.5 wide.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Wunders

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Shoes run small bought for my husband who wears a 10.5 bought him an 11 and they fit him just fine. They do need to be placed loosely otherwise they will feel too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Carter

customer_reviews.title: DC does it again with great fit finish and design! Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are perfect fit. Very well made and durable. Not to mention comfortable. Walked around Barrett Jackson Scottsdale all day and broke them in with no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: When functionality blends with sleek design and comfort your feet win.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many pairs of skateboarding shoes and DC are always my favorite. Exceptional performance and comfy enough to wear daily too. Would recommend ordering a size or a half size bigger than you normally would in my experience they run snug. Also they offer wide sizing options too.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Utley

customer_reviews.title: One shoe smaller then the other
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these shoes but one shoe was to tight and we had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Snug Fit and Slim Look
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe, some mixed materials including very durable materials on the toe.
customer_reviews.author: C Clark

customer_reviews.title: Sexy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really nice. Like a lotta shoes they take time to break in.
customer_reviews.author: boltsfan52

customer_reviews.title: Different but not bad
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice looking shoe, built well. I’ve been wearing skate shoes for the past 15 years and this is something kind of different from DC, somewhat boot like. I dig it, only thing is it's tight around the very middle of the shoe and its hard to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Damon D

customer_reviews.title: You definitely get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: For a 40$ shoe I'm really not that upset. The quality is pretty thin and cheap feeling but the overall look of the shoe is great. Again I only paid 40$ so I really can't complain about them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Odd colors. Didnt fit like others.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Black white and royal blue pair and those fit great.... Got these and the colors don't show up like on Amazon. Or maybe I'm just blind. And these felt snug compared to the first pair. Don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Break em in
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Gotta break em in. When I first put them on. I thought they were to small. However there is plenty of padding and a flat surface sole. Perfect skate shoe. I wear an ankle brace and the shoes have broken in perfectly. Well built and sturdy skate shoe. Order your true size and break em in.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Howard Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Tight on the sides
customer_reviews.text: Got a size 10 usually wear 9.5 with vans but the shoes good but super tight on the sides might have to break in good shoe
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto A Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but go a size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes got to my house earlier than expected, but seem to run a bit small. Thankfully I was able to return them, and get a size bigger. The larger size fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Skp

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Cool for work
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful but I bit narrow. I wear them here and there great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Allen

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size bigger than what you would normally ware...
customer_reviews.text: I have loved DC's since I bought my first pair in year 2006... THESE SHOES ARE FIRE🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥
customer_reviews.author: Gregory dean aKeesee

customer_reviews.title: Dont spend your money.  Poor everything.
customer_reviews.text: Walmart quality. Length ok but height is to little. Could not wear. Pretty much junk.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bonkowski

customer_reviews.title: Runs tight.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes runs small. Im a ten and it was really tight (almost return them) but I kept them to see if I can stretch them out.
customer_reviews.author: Rene dlc

customer_reviews.title: Issa good
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe light weight looks like a shoe a dad would wear to be cool not the color way but style of it on feet fits snug but once you walk a bit and break them in there good
customer_reviews.author: sal

customer_reviews.title: Not wide
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other DC skate shoes these are not as wide gave them to my nephew. So if you get these keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L

customer_reviews.title: New favorites
customer_reviews.text: Great quality suede, both the thickness and the vibrancy of the color
customer_reviews.author: C&D

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! On of my favorite pairs I've ever had! Like some reviews say...they are a little tight on the front but after you break them in they are perfect! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: H.a

customer_reviews.title: They aight
customer_reviews.text: Glue on sole of shoe coming apart only worn them like 5 times..but they are good other than that
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Fox

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in person than ad
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved how these fit. The mix of materials if nice and interesting. Looks good quality. Actually looked better in person than in the ad itself. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: H. Mix

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Get a half size up. these are tight fitting shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Got them too small returns and exchanges are really easy
customer_reviews.author: Meredeth Workman

customer_reviews.title: Very skinny
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not for anyone with a wide foot.... I own several pair of DCs but I had to return these.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: SKATE DC!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been skating these shoes for a month now and they are super comfortable and have great protection. Grip is great!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Dc
customer_reviews.text: Great product in brand new condition as advertised. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Q Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I love DC shoes and these were perfect but like any new shoe you must break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Wipf

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Clean shoe, very tight around the outside of my foot though.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Cook

customer_reviews.title: Narrow in the front. Not for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: The front of the shoe is so narrow I couldn’t get my foot all the way in.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B. Small

customer_reviews.title: The deliver
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product and the deliver was very fast and efficient
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: DC Men's Maswell Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: Special features include: multi panel upper with hf weld heel logo and foam padded collar and tongue for comfort and support.
feature_bullets: Mens lining for added comfort with EVA sockliner
